column4: hey can anyone tell me where to go for help with ubuntu server internet setup?
what's the dhcp error and are you using dhclient or dhcpcd?
go to a terminal and type ifconfig eth0 down;ifconfig eth0 up;dhclient eth0 does it give any errors?
type route it'll tell you what your gateway is
is it supposed to be mostly letters?
no do yo uhave a default route gateway? can you ping that one? should be an ip
yea i have a default, but it displays letters under the gateway and a * for my ip
ok nslookup <lettersforgateway> to get the ip and/or try pinging it with the letters
can't connect to gateway... what next?
the univeristy probably wont allow me, but I can try. Thanks
